      • getArmorPoints

        static int getArmorPoints(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Gets the armor points for the given player.
        Parameters:
        p - = The player to get the armor points for.
        Returns:
        The amount of armor points the player has.

      • getDamage

        static double getDamage(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack,
                        org.bukkit.entity.Player attacker,
                        org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity victim,
                        double baseDamage)
        Calculates the amount of damage that is done to the victim given the base damage and item stack in the hand. This takes into account both the victims armor as well as any enchantments on the weapon or on the armor.
        Parameters:
        stack - = The ItemStack the player is currently holding.
        attacker - = The player that is the attacker.
        victim - = The victim of the attack. Can be any LivingEntity.
        baseDamage - = The calculated base damage of the attack.
        Returns:
        The amount of damage the attack should output.

      • getTargetEntity

        static org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity getTargetEntity(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                      int distance)
        Gets a target entity within the player's line of sight.
        Parameters:
        player - = The player to check their line of sight.
        distance - = The distance of how far out from the player to check.
        Returns:
        Any LivingEntity that the player is looking at, or null if nothing.
